column3: ACK, nice you removed those `c_str()` calls.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/ed4c7fd4fdc1f5b89162d9e91ad57d16205b06eb for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
